util

Class BitFieldInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.BitFieldInt

  • public class BitFieldInt
extends java.lang.Object
    List of booleans stored as ints

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Resizer resizer
      The Resizer used to resize the underlying int array

    • Constructor Summary

      BitFieldInt()

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
